title: What are some examples of prose in literature? - Quora

response.answer_text: Literature has three genres,i.e,it's divided into two;prose,drama and poetry.If a literary work is not poetry,then it is drama or prose.. Their differences are thatpoetry is written in stanzas,drama is in acts and scenes(scipt writing),while prose are in chapters. Prose is divided into two;fiction and non-fiction.Fiction is a work written based on imaginations while non-fictions are actual live stories or events. Non-fictive works are such as;biography and auto-biography(life story of a person),the letter,the memoir,the journals.Fictive works are;novels,novellas,allegory,romance,short story,fable,and so on.
